# Soundguy Productions

> Professional sound production for events in Portland, Seattle, and the Pacific Northwest since 2005.

## About
Soundguy Productions is a professional audio production company founded by Rich, providing concert-quality sound for events ranging from small coffee shops to large festivals. With over 20 years of experience and 1,000+ events, we offer comprehensive sound solutions with professional-grade equipment and experienced engineers.

## Services
- Small Venue Sound (50-150 guests) - Coffee shops, acoustic shows, private parties
- Club & Theater Sound (150-500 guests) - Live bands, theater productions, comedy shows
- Festival & Large Event Sound (500-2,500+ guests) - Outdoor festivals, summer concert series
- Corporate Event Audio - Presentations, conferences, company gatherings
- Multi-Day Festival Production - Complete infrastructure rental with engineering team
- Equipment Rental - Dry rental available for qualified clients
- Emergency Support - Last-minute backup equipment and engineers

## Service Areas
- Portland, Oregon
- Seattle, Washington
- Pacific Northwest region (Oregon & Washington)

## Key Information
- 20+ years in business (since 2005)
- 1,000+ events produced
- Professional equipment brands: QSC, Allen & Heath, Shure, Chauvet
- Fully insured (COI available)
- Lighting coordination available
- Works within noise ordinances and SPL limits
- No hidden fees, clear pricing

## Equipment
- Line array speaker systems (large events)
- Full-range PA systems (clubs/theaters)
- Digital mixing consoles
- Stage monitoring
- Microphones and DI boxes
- Power distribution
- Rain-ready equipment
- Backup gear on every show
